New Records: Rizwan became the joint-fastest to 2000 runs in T20Is
Key Match Events: Pakistan scored 158 for 7 after being put in to bat first
Babar and Rizwan put on 85 runs for the opening wicket
England won the match by six wickets
Rizwan scored 68 runs off 46 balls with six fours and one six
Babar scored 31 runs off 24 balls with three fours
Harry Brook hit a four to take England home with four balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam mentioned that Pakistan batters need to step up and chip in with consistent performances
Babar mentioned that the Pakistan batters failed to stitch together enough partnerships
Babar praised England for their comeback after the first powerplay
